ul.li:
Include these codes as defined in http://example.org/fhir/CodeSystem/gridhamd-answer-options-cs
CodeDisplay
Q13-1Absent and Absent or clinically insignificant
Q13-2Mild (mild tiredness, loss of energy, fatigue, feelings of heaviness in limbs or being weighted down, or muscular aches or pains) and Absent or clinically insignificant
Q13-3Mild (mild tiredness, loss of energy, fatigue, feelings of heaviness in limbs or being weighted down, or muscular aches or pains) and Occasional
Q13-4Mild (mild tiredness, loss of energy, fatigue, feelings of heaviness in limbs or being weighted down, or muscular aches or pains) and Much of the time
Q13-5Mild (mild tiredness, loss of energy, fatigue, feelings of heaviness in limbs or being weighted down, or muscular aches or pains) and Almost all the time
Q13-6Marked (prominent tiredness, loss of energy, fatigue, feelings of heaviness in limbs or being weighted down, or muscular aches or pains) and Occasional
Q13-7Marked (prominent tiredness, loss of energy, fatigue, feelings of heaviness in limbs or being weighted down, or muscular aches or pains)and Much of the time
Q13-8Marked (prominent tiredness, loss of energy, fatigue, feelings of heaviness in limbs or being weighted down, or muscular aches or pains) and Almost all the time
